attributes.additional_details:
Formula One has been for many years on terrestrial TV either it being BBC or ITV.
The thought of it going to pay per view is totally unacceptable and must be kept for terrestrial viewing for the millions of fans in the UK that watch it.
I as well as many others propose that it is kept terrestrial to preserve it for many to watch and enjoy.
We all pay for a TV licence and should 100% get what we want for what we pay.
